pullRequest.title: StringEncodedValues
pullRequest.bodyText:
minor code cleanup: add generic parameters to Enum references
add StringEncodedValue which encodes Strings based on their index within a predefined list
StringDetails for retrieval via PathDetails

nodes.bodyText: Here also the new method set(property, fwd, bwd) would be required (see #2202)
Here we would need to avoid null values (due to JSON limitation). See DecimalDetails how we do this for infinity.

beforeCommit.message: Collect new Strings as they are passed in via setString

afterCommit.message: Collect new Strings as they are passed in via setString
